CustomField.description: This picklist field is populated during the deposit account opening process. This field indicates the decision made by the customer to either request or refuse institution overdraft services that include and cover overdraft activity on ATM and everyday debit card transactions as part of standard overdraft services. The statement that reflects the customer's decision will be preceded by an X to indicate the selection. The statement not selected is preceded by a short line segment. The picklist value options are: 1/ Request overdraft service on ATM and everyday debit card transactions; and 2/ Refuse overdraft service on ATM and everyday debit card transactions.
CustomField.label: Overdraft Consent
